title: Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Promise, Part 1
description: The war is over...but the adventure has just begun!Picking up exactly where Avatar: The Last Airbender left off, The Promise takes Aang to a Fire Nation colony in the heart of the Earth Nation, where tensions between neighbors threaten to shatter the world's newfound peaceâ€”putting the Avatar on a collision course with one of his closest friends, Fire Lord Zuko!
author: Gene Luen Yang
